verses.name: Numbers 7:63
verses.text: One young bullock, one ram, one lamb of the first year, for a burnt offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:64
verses.text: One kid of the goats for a sin offering:

verses.name: Numbers 7:65
verses.text: And for a sacrifice of peace offerings, two oxen, five rams, five he goats, five lambs of the first year: this was the offering of Abidan the son of Gideoni.

verses.name: Numbers 7:66
verses.text: On the tenth day Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai, prince of the children of Dan, offered:
